mapper.sql: or_id, or_code, or_hosp_id, or_user_id, or_buyname_id, or_createTime, or_updateTime, or_submitTime, or_remark, or_type, or_auditor, or_auditOpinion, "or_AuditTime", or_state
mapper.select: select or_id, or_code, or_hosp_id, or_user_id, or_buyname_id, or_createTime, or_updateTime, or_submitTime, or_remark, or_type, or_auditor, or_auditOpinion, or_AuditTime, or_state from order_form

select or_id,or_code,or_buyname_id,or_hosp_id,or_createTime,or_submitTime,generic_name,product_name,reagent_type, drug_size,company,transver_num,order_biddingPrice,order_TradingPrice,order_buyCount,order_buyPrice,factory_name,order_buyState from order_form of left join orderlist_info oi on of.or_id = oi.order_id left join drug_info di on di.drug_id = oi.drug_id
